products.name: Pink Louis Pajama Set
products.brandedName: Sleeper Pink Louis Pajama Set
products.unbrandedName: Pink Louis Pajama Set
products.description: Born from a dream about pajamas on Christmas night and female-founded, Sleeper debuted its first collection in 2014. Since then, it has garnered high praise and a cult-following from celebrities and fashionistas around the world. We are loving this Mandarin-inspired pink pajama shirt and pants set in soft, lightweight certified viscose with a subtle shine. The boxy shirt features shawl lapels, handcrafted Chinese frog fasteners at the front, and flared split sleeves with contrast trimming. Its elasticated high-waist pants are slightly cropped with a gentle flare and front split that matches the sleeve. Wear the set from bed to breakfast, and beyond. V-neckline with shawl lapels Long flared sleeves with slits at cuff Front frog fastening closure Contrast trim along neckline and sleeves Elastic waistband Relaxed fit Slits at pants hem Contrast trim along hem Material: 100% Viscose (main), 100% Polyester (trim) Care: Dry clean

products.name: Off White Tropical Romance Maxi Dress
products.brandedName: Farm Rio Off White Tropical Romance Maxi Dress
products.unbrandedName: Off White Tropical Romance Maxi Dress
products.description: Farm Rio is a carbon-neutral clothing and lifestyle brand based in Brazil. Perfect for the adventurous girl, the pieces are made up of luxe fabrics, bright colors, and beautiful patterned prints inspired by Brazilian biodiversity. Farm Rio is part of the United Nations Global Impact and is working toward a more sustainable future for the planet, society, their business, costumers, and future generations. Embrace the allure of the Off-White Tropical Romance Maxi Dress by Farm Rio, featuring a vibrant array of embroidered blooms that dance across an enchanting off-white canvas. Delicate scalloped edges frame a flattering square neckline, while whimsical self-tie straps add a touch of playful charm. This dress cinches at the waist before cascading into a flowing maxi skirt, creating an effortlessly romantic silhouette that's perfect for any sunny escapade. Square scalloped neckline Self-tie shoulder straps Fitted bodice Open back Side zip closure Embroidered flowers throughout Scalloped tiers A-line skirt Scalloped hem Maxi length Material: 55% Linen, 45% Viscose Care: Machine wash on delicate, tumble dry low, do not iron, do not dry clean
